title: US Census Bureau Scraper - Output Schema
description: Output schema for Census Bureau table data

tableId.description: Unique identifier for the Census table
tableId.title: Table ID

url.description: Direct URL to view the table on data.census.gov
url.title: URL

survey.description: Survey or program name (e.g., American Community Survey, Decennial Census)
survey.title: Survey

universe.description: The universe or population covered by this table
universe.title: Universe

vintage.description: Vintage or version year of the dataset
vintage.title: Vintage

description.description: Description of what the table contains
description.title: Description

geography.description: Geographic level or area covered by the table
geography.title: Geography

variables.description: Variable definitions and metadata for the table
variables.title: Variables

scrapedTimestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the data was scraped
scrapedTimestamp.title: Scraped Timestamp
